Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • Enemy

  • public class Enemy
extends java.lang.Object
    an AI enemy that heads for and attacks players while they are playing
    Author:
    hdesouza538

             int gridY,

        initializes Enemy as well as its x and y variables
        Parameters:
        x - the initial x value of the enemy
        y - the initial y value of the enemy
        gridX - the 2D int x value
        gridY - the 2D int y value
        d - the direction of the enemy

      • draw

        public void draw(DrawingSurface drawer,
                 processing.core.PImage img,
                 double x,
                 double y)
        draws the enemy on the DrawingSurface using the passed in variables
        Parameters:
        drawer - the DrawingSurface the enemy will be drawn upon
        img - the image of the enemy
        x - the x coordinate of the enemy you are drawing
        y - the y coordinate of the enemy you are drawing
